00023 void GLCameraMediator2D::MoveXY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00024 {
00025         //calculate scale factor and distance moved in x and y direction
00026         float factor = m_GLCamera->getDistance()*0.5/(float)(window_h);
00027         float distX  = (float)(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())*factor;
00028         float distY  = (float)(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)*factor;
00029 
00030         //move to new viewpoint
00031         Vertex viewPoint = old_viewPoint + (old_rightVector*distX);
00032         viewPoint = viewPoint + (old_upVector*distY);
00033 
00034         //set new camera viewpoint
00035         m_GLCamera->setViewPoint(viewPoint);
00036 }

00044 {
00045         MoveXY(event);
00046 }

00054 {
00055         MoveXY(event);

00063 void GLCameraMediator2D::RotateXZ(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00064 {
00065         MoveXY(event);
00066 }

00073 void GLCameraMediator2D::ZoomIn(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00074 {
00075         //get delta distance for zoom
00076         float distance = event.getMouseEvent().GetWheelRotation() / 200.0;
00077 
00078         //change distance of cam
00079         m_GLCamera->changeDistance(distance);
00080 }
